select distinct q.data_id saleContractId, q.string1 saleContractNo, q.flow_status saleContractStatus, q.datetime1 signTime, q.string5 invoiceType , q.string6 deliveryTime, q.string18 payType, q.price1 saleContractAmount, q.string8 payMethod, ct.name as customerName, q.string3 as supplierName, dt1.dept_name as deptName, -- 销售总量 ifnull(sum(bpc.string3),0) saleQty, -- 已付款项 0 paidAmount, -- 已开发票 0 invoicedAmount, -- 已发货数 0 deliveryQty from biz_process_data q left join sys_user u on q.create_by=u.user_id left join sys_dept dt on u.dept_id=dt.dept_id left join biz_data_status ds on ds.string3=q.data_id left join biz_customer ct on ct.customer_id=q.string2 left join sys_dept dt1 on q.string22=dt1.dept_id left join biz_process_child bpc on bpc.data_id=q.data_id
group by q.data_id order by q.create_time desc

select distinct q.data_id purchaseContractId, q.string1 chargeCompany, q.string12 purchaseContractNo, q.string2 deptName, q.datetime2 deliveryDate, q.datetime3 outDate, q.price1 as contractAmount, q.string11 as purchaseStatus, q.string20 as payWay, s.name supplierName, -- 到货数量 0 arrivalQty, -- 到货货款 0 arrivalAmount, -- 已付货款 0 as paidAmount from biz_process_data q left join biz_suppliers s on s.suppliers_id=q.string6
order by q.create_time desc
